adjectives.description: thunderstruck (comparative more thunderstruck, superlative most thunderstruck)

entries.meaning: Astonished, amazed or so suddenly surprised as to be unable to speak.
examples: 'Unless the strikers rally,' I declared to the meeting, 'and continue the strike till a settlement is reached, or till they leave the mills altogether, I will not touch any food.' The labourers were thunderstruck.
